Package io.micronaut.security.filters

Security and authentication filters.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationFetcher
    Describes a bean which attempts to read an Authentication from a HttpRequest being executed.
    SecurityFilterConfiguration
    Configuration for SecurityFilter.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SecurityFilter
    Security Filter.
    SecurityFilterConfigurationProperties
    ConfigurationProperties implementation of SecurityFilterConfiguration.
